name: Robots Battle Multiplayer
description:
Robots Battle Multiplayer is a battle game in which you must beat your opponent's robot as fast as you can. USA already challenged Japan to a robot battle. Now it's your turn!

Fun and addictive!
Try to beat your friends and challenge them again.

Features:

● Five Special attacks for each robot.
● Facebook Integration.
● Multiplayer with thousands players.
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
● Easy to setup profile.

Play this game with your whole family.
